A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While Rian Johnson outdoes himself with his direction and other elements of production remain top-notch\, The Last Jedi is filled with useless characters\, unnecessary plot elements\, and liberal undertones of politicization that greatly detract from the continuing of the Star Wars plot line. It's safe to say that Disney wrote some checks to the New York Times and Washington Post to maintain that 90% plus critic rating\, which anyone who's seen the film knows is completely and totally undeserved.
